amendment.description: Amendment sought to ensure the continued supply of helium for end users while requiring the Bureau of Land Management (BLM) to honor existing contracts for the supply and delivery of helium and also sought to affirm that the federal government will honor existing contracts that are set to expire October 1, 2015.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 113-47 to ensure the continued supply of helium for end users while requiring the Bureau of Land Management (BLM) to honor existing contracts for the supply and delivery of helium. The amendment affirms that the federal government will honor existing contracts that are set to expire October 1, 2015.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dent amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 87 - 312 (Roll no. 126).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Dent.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Dent amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 87 - 312 (Roll no. 126).
